abstract.t: This document specifies the Collaboration Tunnel Protocol, a method for efficient, verifiable content delivery between web publishers and automated agents. The protocol typically achieves up to 90% bandwidth reduction (83% median measured) through bidirectional URL discovery, template-invariant content fingerprinting, sitemap-first verification, and strict conditional request discipline.
